name: Manabu Namiki
description: {{nihongo|'''Manabu Namiki'''|並木 学|Namiki Manabu|born September 13, 1971}} is a Japanese [[video game music|video game composer]] who is primarily known for his work in [[shoot 'em up]] games. He has worked at game companies such as Allumer, [[NMK (company)|NMK]], [[Raizing]] and [[M2 (game developer)|M2]]. In October 2002, Namiki, [[Hitoshi Sakimoto]], and [[Masaharu Iwata]] founded the music production company Basiscape, whom he worked with until 2011.
